tweet: Quick update today on the fight to expand testing for New Jersey's long term care facilities. I also had an opportunity today to talk with some of our neighbors observing #Ramadan. These are tough times, and community is important - even as we socially distance. https://t.co/9OeG2Frqwj

Some inspiring examples of how our communities rise to the challenge in the toughest of times. https://t.co/GOyKZjZEFg
